description: "This map focuses on the mountain ranges along the west coast of central Sumatra. Military bases, post offices, villages, rivers and hot springs are also marked, and there are inset maps of the towns of Padang and Singkel (Singkil)."
title: "General-Karte von Mittleren Sumatra von Padang bis Singkel. Franz Wilhelm Junghuhn. Facsimile. Plate 47 in Asia in Maps. By E. Klemp [cartographic material]."
